```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(openintro)
library(FIT)
set.seed(1234)
glimpse(email)
```

```{r}
email %>% 
  group_by(spam) %>%
  summarise(mean_num_char = mean(num_char))
```
```{r}
email %>%
  ggplot(aes(mean_num_char, spam)) +
  geom_density_ridges()
```
```{r}
email%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = re_subj, fill = spam)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  labs(
    x = 'Whether "re:", etc. was in the email subject',
    fill = "Spam",
    y =  'NULL',
    title = 'Spam vs "re." in subject'
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#DEB4A0", "#CA235F"))
```

```{r}
spam_fit <- logistic_reg() %>%
  set_engine("glm") %>%
  fit(spam ~ num_char, data = email, family = "binomial")
tidy(spam_fit)
```
